entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
